18:46 <Boscorama> Hi folks.  Just did a fresh install of xwiki-enterprise-tomcat7-pgsql (7.1.1) on Ubuntu 14.04 and all was good. Tried making xwiki into ROOT in Tomcat (per install instructions) and all the icon theme broke and no menus.  Returned to non-ROOT mode and all is ok.  Tried searching but no obvious resolution.  Any ideas/known problems in this regard?  Thx.
